Title: Authorizes school districts to submit an opt-out waiver to the commissioner of education authorizing such districts to opt-out of certain zero-emission school bus requirements
Summary: Authorizes school districts to submit an opt-out waiver to the commissioner of education authorizing such districts to opt-out of certain zero-emission school bus requirements.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to authorizing school districts to opt-out of zero-emission school bus requirements
